title: Sendhit pack out MTB First Aid Kit for no more excuses (outdoor first aid training not included)
content:
Sendhit has released a first aid kit specifically for mountain bikers, containing wound dressings, scissors, forceps, whistle, wound cleaning strips and more. Though not intended to be a replacement for proper first aid training, Sendhit also enclose an advice card printed in five languages, designed to guide a rider through the most important steps of

The post Sendhit pack out MTB First Aid Kit for no more excuses (outdoor first aid training not included) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
